column2:

column2: Please remember that I'm always here and ready to talk. I admire you so much and I want to help you heal in any way I can.

column2: I understand, [Name]. It's never okay to bully others, and I'm here for you. If you want to talk about it or need any help, please feel free to reach out to me.
column3: Bullying is never okay. You don't deserve to be treated that way.
column4: Bullying is never okay. You don't deserve to be treated that way. I'm here for you, and I want to help you feel better.
column5: Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope you're okay. Is there anything I can do to help?
column6: Being bullied is never okay. Have you talked to anyone about it?
